name: hydra-lfo
description: Control utility library for Hydra visualization

scripts.dist: npm run rebuild && copyfiles -u 1 build/hydralfo* dist/
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build_normal && npm run build_mini
scripts.build_normal: browserify --standalone 'hydralfo' --debug -t babelify src/*.js | exorcist build/hydralfo.js.map > build/hydralfo.js
scripts.build_mini: browserify --standalone 'hydralfo' --debug -t [ babelify --envName 'build:mini' ] src/*.js | exorcist build/hydralfo.min.js.map > build/hydralfo.min.js

author: oscons
